name: Julian Loss
content: HOME JULIAN LOSS I am a Professor for Computer Science at Ruhr University Bochum. I am broadly interested in cryptography and its applications to distributed algorithms. My research is generously supported by an ERC Starting Grant. ABONNIEREN SIE UNSEREN NEWSLETTER Kontakt Hier finden Sie uns: Prinz-Regent-Straße 5, 44799 Bochum, Germany E-Mail: lossjulian@gmail.com Rufen Sie uns an: +49 170 7075568 Anfahrt Öffnungszeiten Mo - Fr 9:00 - 17:00 Sa - So Geschlossen Share by:
